snippet: U.S. military operations in Iraq, including airstrikes and surveillance flights, have cost about $560 million since mid-June, the Pentagon said Friday....

headline.print_headline: Pentagon: Iraq Operations Cost $560 Million So Far
headline.main: Pentagon: Iraq Operations Cost $560 Million So Far

lead_paragraph: U.S. military operations in Iraq, including airstrikes and surveillance flights, have cost about $560 million since mid-June, the Pentagon said Friday.
